name: ui-router-demo
description: Angular ts project setup:   1. Bower install front end dependencies (angular, ui-router, 3rd party libs, etc.  ** 2. Create .ts file then use atom palette to get predefined tsconfig.json 3. Install typings for front end dependencies, i.e. 4. typings install dt~angular --global --save 5. Npm install back end packages if necessary **
